name: test_netbox_storage
description:
arrange: Build and deploy the NetBox charm.
    act: Create a site and post an image
    assert: The site is created and there is an extra object (the image)
        in S3.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: Build and deploy the NetBox charm.
act: Create a site and post an image
assert: The site is created and there is an extra object (the image)
    in S3.

testStage.description:
arrange: Build and deploy the NetBox charm.
    act: Create a site and post an image
    assert: The site is created and there is an extra object (the image)
        in S3.
